summary: Junior developer who is driven, creative and a quick learner. Experienced with data engineering, web APIs, XR Unity development and creative coding. Strong troubleshooting abilities, and equipped with adaptable skills.

education.summary: I was given a scholarship to continue my studies and research into XR at AU. I worked as research assistant under Professor William Brent, researching audio signal processing techniques and machine learning, and co-developing applications for low-latency audio streaming for remote learning during the pandemic. During this time, I dove deep into machine learning, neural networks, signal processing, and honed my skills in Python, C++, and C#.
activities: Technical support for remote choir rehearsals

education.summary: I got my Undergraduate Degree from AU in Audio Production, which I discovered to be a deep passion of mine after shifting around from Film and Political Science.
